reviewText: It met my expectations.  I have only tried it with one of my dogs am going to try it with the other fog soon.
Great exercise program for you and your dog!
Easy to follow directions, the instructor gives clear and concise directions.  Love that she has yoga for large and small dogs....  Love it.

Not very good, the workouts are very basic and the explanations are not that great. I am a dog lover but I could only sit through the DVD once. "B-" for effort as the DVD is quite professionally done but an "F" for content. Sorry but it is really not good at all.
